metadata.title: ØLIV – Farm hospitality & ØLIV Brew on Bornholm
metadata.description: ØLIV – Farm hospitality on Bornholm. Peaceful farm stays 300 m from the Baltic Sea with our own brewery, farm sauna and natural surroundings. Authentic experiences without shows.

hero.description: A small farm 300 meters from the Baltic Sea. Here you'll find peace, nature and authentic experiences – no shows, no exaggerations. Just good craftsmanship, local produce and time to be present.
hero.note: Especially summer and weekends book up quickly. We recommend planning 2-3 months in advance.

coast.title: By the coast
coast.description: 300 meters from the Baltic Sea. The sound of waves every morning.

farmToTable.title: Farm to table
farmToTable.description: Local produce, eggs from the farm, beer from our brewery.

sustainable.title: Sustainable operation
sustainable.description: Solar panels, own water supply, minimal waste.

intimate.title: Few rooms
intimate.description: Only 5 rooms for an intimate and personal experience.

experience.title: The ØLIV experience
experience.subtitle: Farm hospitality isn't about luxury in the traditional sense. It's about authenticity, being close to nature, experiencing the place as it is – no filter, no show.

accommodation.title: Accommodation
accommodation.description: Simple, Nordic rooms designed for tranquility. Good beds, natural materials and views of the farm or sea. No TV, no unnecessary noise – just the essentials.

sauna.title: Farm sauna
sauna.description: A simple wooden sauna by the farm. Warm up, dip in cold water, and feel the calm settle. No spa music, no grand gestures – just warmth, cold and silence.

brewery.title: ØLIV Brew
brewery.description: Our own microbrewery. Light, clean beers brewed with local ingredients and inspired by the place. Tastings can be arranged – we're happy to share the story behind each beer.

surroundings.title: The farm & surroundings
surroundings.description: Explore the farm, stretch your legs along the coast, or just sit in the garden and listen. There's no fixed program – just the opportunity to be present.

spring.title: Spring
spring.description: When nature awakens and the light returns. Perfect time for walks along the coast and experiencing the island's blooming. The temperature is mild, and there's peace around the farm.

summer.title: Summer
summer.description: Bornholm's high season with long daylight and warm weather. The sea is inviting, and the island is at its most beautiful. Book early – summer fills up quickly.

autumn.title: Autumn
autumn.description: Nature changes colors, and the temperature drops. Perfect for quiet days by the sauna and long evenings with beer from the brewery. Fewer tourists, more peace.

winter.title: Winter
winter.description: Quiet days focused on peace and presence. The sauna is warm, the beers are dark, and nature is at rest. Perfect for relaxing and recharging.

testimonials.title: What guests say
testimonials.ctaNote: We'll get back to you within 24 hours with availability and offer

place.title: 300 meters from the Baltic Sea
place.text1: Bornholm is different. The island has its own light, its own rhythm and its own atmosphere. Here the distance to Sweden is shorter than to Copenhagen, and nature is always close.
place.text2: ØLIV is located in the heart of the Bornholm landscape, where farm life meets the sea, and calm meets nature's rhythms. It's a place where you can feel the difference – where the pace slows, and where you can be present.
place.text3: Come and experience authentic farm hospitality on a small farm by the sea. No shows, no exaggerations – just good craftsmanship and genuine experiences.

quotes.text: Authentic farm hospitality focused on peace and nature
ØLIV Brew is a must-try for beer enthusiasts

meta.title: Spa & Experiences – ØLIV Farm hospitality
meta.description: Spa & experiences at ØLIV – Farm sauna, cold water and quiet surroundings. A simple ritual without spa music.

hero.title: Spa & Experiences
hero.subtitle: A small farm sauna, cold water and quiet surroundings – a simple ritual without spa music and grand gestures.

main.title: Farm sauna & cold water
main.intro: Land after a day by the sea, warm up and feel the calm.
main.text1: We heat up at selected times – combine with cold water, a glass of beer or just complete peace. It's a place where the pace slows, and where you can feel the difference from city life.
main.text2: The sauna is small and intimate – few guests at a time. It's about being present, not about getting through all the treatments.
features: Farm sauna (few guests at a time)

steps.title: Warm up
steps.description: Enter the sauna and let the heat penetrate. We heat up at selected times – usually in the afternoon and evening.

steps.title: Cool down
steps.description: After the sauna, cool down with cold water or fresh air. Jump in the sea if you dare, or use our cold water bath.

steps.title: Relax
steps.description: Take a break. Drink a glass of water, a glass of beer from the brewery, or just sit quietly and feel the calm.

steps.title: Repeat
steps.description: Repeat the cycle as many times as you like. It's about finding your own rhythm.

questions.title: When is the sauna open?
questions.answer: We heat up at selected times, usually in the afternoon (15-17) and evening (19-21). Contact us when booking to hear the exact times.

questions.title: What should I bring?
questions.answer: We provide robes and towels. Just bring yourself and time to relax.

questions.title: Is it included?
questions.answer: Spa can be added to selected stays. Contact us to hear about spa packages and prices.

questions.title: Can children participate?
questions.answer: Yes, children are welcome, but we recommend they are over 8 years old and always supervised by adults.

items.title: Farm tours
items.description: Get a tour of the farm. See the chickens, the garden, and learn about farm life. Free for all guests.

items.title: Coast walks
items.description: We can recommend the best paths and places along the coast. Get our guide to the area on arrival.

items.title: Brewery tasting
items.description: Taste beer from ØLIV Brew. Learn about the brewing process and taste different types.

items.title: Breakfast on the terrace
items.description: Enjoy breakfast on the terrace with views of the sea. Served every morning from 8-10.

items.title: SUP & Kayak
items.description: Explore the coast with SUP or kayak. Can be added when booking or on arrival.

items.title: Zipline
items.description: Try zipline in the area. Can be added on request.

meta.title: ØLIV Brew – Brewery on Bornholm
meta.description: ØLIV Brew – Brewed by the coast. Light, clean beers inspired by the sea, the light and the rhythm of the island.

hero.subtitle: Brewed by the coast. Light, clean beers inspired by the sea, the light and the rhythm of the island.

main.title: Brewed on the farm
main.subtitle: ØLIV Brew is a natural part of the stay
main.text1: ØLIV Brew is a natural part of the stay – taste with food, in the brewery or on the terrace.
main.text2: Small tastings with calm, time and stories about ingredients and process. Good craftsmanship without shows.
main.text3: We brew small batches focusing on quality over quantity. Each beer tells a story about the place and the season.

beers.kystlys: Inspired by Bornholm's light. Light and refreshing with notes of citrus and sea air. Perfect for a sunset on the terrace.
beers.ipa: Bold and aromatic with local herbs from the garden. A beer that tastes of the place and the season.
beers.havbris: Light and cloudy with a fresh finish. Like a breeze from the sea – refreshing and clean.
beers.stout: Winter's favorite. Dark and complex with notes of coffee and chocolate. Perfect for cold evenings.

ingredients.title: Ingredients
ingredients.description: We use local ingredients where possible – malt from Danish malthouses, hops from Northern European farms, and water from Bornholm's limestone ground.

brewing.title: Brewing
brewing.description: Small batches are brewed in our small brewery on the farm. Each batch gets time to develop – no rush.

fermentation.title: Fermentation
fermentation.description: The beers ferment in calm surroundings. We let nature do its work while we keep an eye on the process.

maturation.title: Maturation
maturation.description: After fermentation, the beers get time to mature. Some mature for weeks, others for months – depending on the type.

small.title: Small tasting
small.description: Taste 2-3 of our beers with a short story about the brewing process. About 30 minutes.

extended.title: Extended tasting
extended.description: Taste all our beers with snacks and a deeper story about ingredients and process. About 1 hour.

private.title: Private tasting
private.description: Private tasting just for you. We tailor the experience to your interests and wishes.

philosophy.title: No shows – just good craftsmanship
philosophy.text1: We don't brew to impress or to make big shows. We brew because we love the process, the ingredients, and creating something with our hands.
philosophy.text2: ØLIV Brew is part of farm life – not a tourist attraction. It's beer brewed with respect for tradition, but with an eye for quality and taste.
philosophy.text3: When you taste our beer, you taste the place. The sea, the light, the rhythm of the island – it's all there in the glass.

meta.title: About us – ØLIV Farm hospitality
meta.description: About ØLIV – Farm hospitality on Bornholm. Learn about the farm, the vision and how to find us.

hero.title: About ØLIV
hero.subtitle: Farm hospitality on Bornholm – peaceful farm stays 300 m from the coast.

story.title: The story of ØLIV
story.text1: ØLIV is a small farm on Bornholm that has become a place for peace, nature and authentic experiences. We started with a vision to create something different from traditional beach hotels – something more grounded, calm and honest.
story.text2: The farm has been in the family for generations, and we have gradually transformed it into a place where guests can experience farm life, nature and the unique atmosphere of Bornholm.
story.text3: ØLIV Brew started as a passion and is now a natural part of the stay. We brew small batches focusing on quality and taste – not quantity or shows.

items.title: Presence
items.description: We believe in being present – both for ourselves and for our guests. It's about slowing down and feeling the moment.

items.title: Nature
items.description: Nature is part of everything we do. From local produce to sustainable operation – we respect and protect nature.

items.title: Craftsmanship
items.description: Good craftsmanship takes time. We choose quality over quantity, and we're proud of what we make with our hands.

items.title: Calm
items.description: Calm is not lack of activity – it's an awareness of time and space. We create a place where calm can be found.

items.title: Sustainability
items.description: Solar panels on the roof, low consumption, local produce. We strive to be part of nature, not against it.

items.title: Honesty
items.description: No shows, no exaggerations. We're honest about what we are and what we offer – and that's enough.

items.title: From Copenhagen
items.description: Ferry from Køge to Rønne (about 5 hours), then 15 minutes by car or bike to ØLIV.

items.title: From Ystad (Sweden)
items.description: Ferry from Ystad to Rønne (about 1 hour), then 15 minutes by car or bike.

items.title: By car
items.description: Parking on the farm. We recommend coming by car to explore the island.

items.title: By bike
items.description: Bornholm is perfect for cycling. We have bike parking and can recommend the best routes.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.text: Solar panels on the roof, low consumption, local produce. We strive to be part of nature, not against it.
items: Solar panels cover most of our energy consumption
Local and organic produce in breakfast
Minimal waste – we compost and recycle
Support for local producers and craftspeople

items.question: What's included in the price?
items.answer: The price includes accommodation, breakfast with local produce, and access to the farm and terrace. Spa and brewery tasting can be added.

items.question: Can you come with children?
items.answer: Yes, we're child-friendly. Some rooms are better suited for families – contact us to find the right room.

items.question: What about allergies and diet?
items.answer: We can adapt breakfast to allergies and diet. Tell us in the booking enquiry, and we'll take care of it.

items.question: When is check-in and check-out?
items.answer: Check-in is from 15:00, and check-out is by 11:00. We can be flexible – contact us if you need something else.

items.question: Is there WiFi?
items.answer: Yes, there's free WiFi throughout the farm. But we encourage you to turn off your phone and enjoy nature.

items.question: Can you buy beer to take home?
items.answer: Yes, we sell our beer to guests. Contact us on arrival to hear about availability.
